title: Bloomberg Markets: Krumpelman on More to Tech Than FANG
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Krumpelman on More to Tech Than FANG
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Jeff Krumpelman\u0010Chief Investment Officer\u0010RiverPoint Capital Management \u0010Discussing why he has lightened-up on the FANG stocks and is a bit more cautious there, saying there's a lot more to like in tech than just FANG.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
